channel.title: Rd on ReFarmer.Net Developer Version
channel.description: Recent content in Rd on ReFarmer.Net Developer Version

item.title: Taxonomy Development
item.description: To make this site into a useful rsource, even just (especially!) for myself, i need a taxonomy (i.e. Categories and Tags, essentially… Plus any ancillary elements in the site navigation: menu bar, sidebar, naming conventions, etc.) that will make it easy to find (i.e. search and filter) content whenever i need it quickly. Key concepts i’m considering ATM are: Categories are mandatory and mutually exclusive; each post must be assigned to one and only one category Tags are optional and can overlapping: a post can have any nuumber of tags from 0:many
